long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RePalette is a chrome extension that will recolor every webpage you go to based on a given palette. You can edit your palettes by clicking the RePalette extension icon.

Green Toggle : enables and disables chrome extension
Blue Toggle : enables and disables current palette
Trash Icon : deletes current palette

Create New Palette:

     1. Write the name of your palette in the "Name" text field
     2. Press the "+ Create Palette" button to add palette

Select Palette:

     1. Hover over palette dropdown (to the right of the "+ Create Palette" button)
     2. Select your desired palette

Add Color To Current Palette:

     1. Select your palette
     2. Press the color box (starts out as white) and choose your color
     3. Press "Enter"
     4. Press the "+" button under the color box

Make Palette Specific To A URL:

     1. Press the "Apply palette to all websites" button above the green toggle
     2. Type the name of the base URL (Should be in the format of "website.com")
